p: In general, the R ct value is utilized to calculate the inhibition efficiency ( η) of the protective film using the formula η = ( R ct − R ct 0)/ R ct [ 43], in which R ct and R ct 0 represent the charge transfer resistance of the superhydrophobic AA5083 specimen and the pristine AA5083 specimen. It was calculated using the R ct and R ct 0 values discussed above that the inhibition efficiency in this case was approximately 96.11%, indicating an impressive performance resisting marine corrosion attack.
